resources.string:
Rules. 
Players are divided into teams. Each team takes turns: a player of the team has to describe a word.
The task of the team is to guess the word. 
The player can only use facial expressions, movements and gestures 
The player cannot speak or answer questions.
The number of players is unlimited
Words in this category are over! Exit to the menu and select another category or click again to start over

Horizon Salt Rock Skyscraper Elevator Author Sofa Cat Watermelon School Desk Roof Grass Earth Wind Cup Diamond Kid Bouquet Sugar Ball Plant Anchor Flame Plum Apple Tea Picture Question Magazine Saturday Calendar Coffee Leopard Bathroom Chainsaw Cup Linoleum Snail Cocoa Hippopotamus Bohemian Narcissus Confessor Kangaroo Shampoo
